name: voiceflow-dialog-management-api-sample-webchat
description: website embedded chatbot sample using Voiceflow Dialog Management API

VF_API_KEY.description: set Voiceflow API Key for your project.

FRONTEND_URL.description: set HTTPS-enabled frontend URL which hosts chat clients.

MAX_AGE.description: set seconds to keep session. (default: 3600 secs = 1hour)
